heroTitle: Know Your Rights, Track Your District
heroDescription: Simple and visual way to understand MGNREGA performance in your district
jobCardsDesc: Number of families registered for MGNREGA work
dataNotFoundDesc: Unable to load data for this district
footerDescription: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act - Guaranteeing 100 days of wage employment to rural households
visualTrendsDesc: Easy-to-understand charts and graphs showing district performance over time
compareDistrictsDesc: See how your district performs compared to state and national averages
multiLanguageDesc: Available in Hindi, English, and major regional languages
comparisonDesc: Select up to 3 districts to compare their MGNREGA performance
mgnregaDefinition: The Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA) guarantees 100 days of wage employment per year to rural households.
mgnregaBackground: Enacted on August 25, 2005, MGNREGA is one of the worldâ€™s largest work guarantee programmes, covering over 12 crore beneficiaries.
dashboardFeaturesIntro: This dashboard visualizes MGNREGA performance data in a user-friendly way. Features include:
featureVisual: Simple and visual representation with icons and color-coding
featureMultilingual: Multilingual support for major Indian languages
featureDataSource: Data sourced and updated directly from official government portals
dataFetchedFromOGD: All data is fetched from the official Open Government Data Platform India (data.gov.in).
